overview: For his last concert tour "The seasons pass" 2009/2011, which accompanied the album "Mister Mystère" - M - found the vibrations of Bercy. For 3 days (from 15 to 17 December last year), he met his audience in the largest hall in Paris together as a group of friends at home, with the desire to share a memorable evening.
title: M - Bercy 17.12.2010
